mapper.select: SELECT RV_NUM, RV_TITLE, RV_REGDATE, RV_ID, RV_CNT, RV_LIKE, RV_CONTENT, RV_IMAGE, R FROM (SELECT RV_NUM, RV_TITLE, RV_REGDATE, RV_ID, RV_CNT, RV_LIKE, RV_CONTENT, RV_IMAGE, ROWNUM R FROM (SELECT RV_NUM, RV_TITLE, RV_REGDATE, RV_ID, RV_CNT, RV_LIKE, RV_CONTENT, RV_IMAGE FROM REVIEW ORDER BY RV_REGDATE DESC) ) WHERE R BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RV_NUM DESC) RNUM, RV_NUM, RV_TITLE, RV_REGDATE, RV_ID, RV_CNT, RV_LIKE, RV_CONTENT, RV_IMAGE FROM REVIEW
SELECT BC_BCID, BC_NUM, BC_COMMENT, BC_REGDATE, BC_ID FROM BOARDCOMMENT WHERE BC_NUM = #{RV_NUM} ORDER BY BC_BCID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW VALUES( RV_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{RV_TITLE}, SYSDATE, #{RV_ID}, 0, 0, #{RV_CONTENT}, #{RV_IMAGE} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE RV_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR RV_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
